description: Preparatory Assistance: Drought Response in the Kurdistan Region

subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description:
1-	 Preparative phase (15 days in Jordan)
2-	Project initiation document describing in detail the way forward. (5 days in Iraq)
3-	A fully elaborated Drought Impact Assessment including a consolidation of information on drought, current plans and initiatives in the KRG and Iraq as a whole as it related to the KRG.
4-	A fully elaborated Drought Impact, Recovery and Mitigation Framework (in detail for year 1, less details for years 5) (22 days in Jordan for the International Consultant and in Iraq for the National Consultants)
5-	Regional project design; in detail for year 1, in less detail for years 2-5
6-	Launch of the drought Impact Assessment and the Drought Recovery and Mitigation Framework
7-	Final reporting (3 days),
subproject.title: Preparatory Assistance: Drough

title: Preparatory Assistance: Drought Response in the Kurdista
